definitions.definition: An elevated landmass smaller than a mountain .
examples: The park is sheltered from the wind by a hill to the east.
You need to pick up speed to get up the hill that's coming up.

definitions.definition: A heap of earth surrounding a plant .
A single cluster or group of plants growing close together, and having the earth heaped up about them.
examples: a hill of corn or potatoes

definitions.definition: The raised portion of the surface of a vinyl record .

main_definition: An elevated landmass smaller than a mountain .
secondary_definitions: ( US ) A heap of earth surrounding a plant .
( US ) A single cluster or group of plants growing close together, and having the earth heaped up about them.
The raised portion of the surface of a vinyl record .
